```{r setup, include = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
set.seed(1)
```

```{r}
z_scores = function(x) {
  
  z = (x - mean(x)) / sd(x)
  return(z)
  
}
# define the function of Z-score with braces({}) 
# test the function 

x_vec = rnorm(25, mean = 5, sd = 3)
(x_vec - mean(x_vec)) / sd(x_vec)

z_scores(x_vec)
```
